author: pmandrik
body:
#### PR description:

update DQM beam* clients to use available config data to check if machine is playback or production instead of the path to the CMSSW folder (which is unsafe).

#### PR validation:

Tested at P5 DQM playback

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38262
title: [12_3_X] Update DQM beam clients playback machine type check
